A: 4. What is the currency used in Nigeria? (a) Dollar (b) Naira (c) Euro
5. If you have 5 naira and you spend 2 naira, how much do you have left? (a) 3 naira (b) 5 naira (c) 7 naira
6. What time is it when the short hand is on 6 and the long hand is on 12? (a) 6:00 (b) 12:00 (c) 6:30
7. If it is 9:00 am now, what time will it be in 2 hours? (a) 10:00 am (b) 11:00 am (c) 12:00 pm
9. If you have 3 pencils and you get 2 more, how many pencils do you have now? (a) 3 (b) 4 (c) 5
10. If a toy costs 8 naira and you pay with 10 naira, how much change will you get? (a) 1 naira (b) 2 naira (c) 3 naira
11. What is 1 hour after 3:00 pm? (a) 2:00 pm (b) 3:00 pm (c) 4:00 pm
12. If you have 15 naira and you spend 5 naira, how much do you have left? (a) 10 naira (b) 12 naira (c) 15 naira
14. If it is 12:00 pm now, what time was it 2 hours ago? (a) 10:00 am (b) 11:00 am (c) 12:00 pm
16. If a book costs 12 naira and you have 15 naira, how much money will you have left after buying the book? (a) 1 naira (b) 2 naira (c) 3 naira
17. What time is it when the short hand is on 9 and the long hand is on 6? (a) 9:00 (b) 9:30 (c) 6:00
19. If you have 2 groups of 3 pencils, how many pencils do you have in total? (a) 4 (b) 5 (c) 6
20. If it is 4:00 pm now, what time will it be in 5 hours? (a) 3:00 pm (b) 9:00pm (c) 10:00pm
